name: Best Website Hosting India
short_description:
It's challenging to decide best hosting provider for your website at time when there are several of web hosting services all guaranteeing for similar web host offers. To recognize the best web hosting is not as challenging as most evaluation sites say it is. 

We are providing the following services,

•	Guaranteed 99.9% uptime.
•	Our Linux Hosting plans comes with PHP and MySQL Databases.
•	Our web hosting plans support CMS like Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal, Magento and more.
•	Each of our web hosting plans contains email, FTP, and sub-domains We also provide 24/7 Technical support.
•	Custom hosting plans according to the clients requirements.
•	No Hidden Cost, NO Setup fee & No Extra Payments
•	FREE Control Panel, Database Manager, Add-on/Parked Domain.
•	24/7 Support in multiple local languages.
•	Free installation and setup of Blog/Business/E-commerce Websites.

For more details log on
http://www.best-hostings.in/
summary: Best-hostings.in is the Best Indian web Hosting Company.
